calcTicketPrice(TicketType, int, int) - Method in class managers.TicketManager
Calculate the price of a ticket, using the formula of Ticket Type's Price * Cinema Class's Price * Movie Type's Price * Seat Type's Price

checkHistory(Account) - Method in class managers.CustomerAccManager
Opens the user's booking history csv file and extract the information Prints out all user's booking history information such as booking ID, movie name, cineplex, cinema, movie date and time, ticket seat and cost, transaction date and time and total amount paid
checkLogin(String, String) - Method in class managers.CustomerAccManager

checkLogin(List<Account>, String, String) - Method in class managers.AccountManager
Checks login details by checking whether the username and password exists in the database, accounts.csv
checkValidEmail(String) - Method in class managers.AccountManager
Checks if the email input is valid based on pre-defined regex when creating new account For the Local Part: It allows numeric values from 0 to 9.
checkValidPhoneNumber(String) - Method in class managers.AccountManager
Checks if the phone number input is valid based on pre-defined regex when creating new account Allows only a string of length 8 First number must begin with 8 or 9 2nd to 8th number can contain any digit

confirm(String) - Static method in class utils.IOUtils
Function to allow user to confirm his choice This method only accept 'y' or 'n' as input return true if input is 'y' or return false if input is 'n' Otherwise it will repeatedly prompt user for input

createAcc(List<Account>) - Method in class managers.CustomerAccManager
Function to create new user account Asks user for username and checks if username already exist in the list of accounts Ask user for email and checks if email entered is a valid email address using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for mobile number and check if mobile number entered is a valid number using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for age and check if age is valid Ask user for password and check if password is strong using function in utils/PasswordStrengthChecker class After getting information, all the information will be stored in acc and appended to the csv file with the list of accounts
createBooking() - Method in class managers.BookingManager
Final function which creates the Booking and Transaction class and stores all the information into a csv file update all necessary csv files and finally stop all instances
createStaffAccount(List<Account>) - Method in class managers.StaffAccManager
Function to create new staff account Checks for empty username input and whether the username already exists Checks if the email is valid according to pre-defined regex function in AccountManager class Checks if the mobile number is valid according to pre-defined regex function in AccountManager class Checks if the age is valid.
